Items.Title: Application no. 20065458 HAX, submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to the Private Housing Finance Law for the acquisition, rehabilitation and a related tax exemption for property located at 1971 and 1975 Grand Avenue, Council District no. 14, Borough of the Bronx.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 060250 HAX, an Urban Development Action Area Designation and Project, located at 1510-1530 Jesup Avenue, and the disposition of such property, Borough of the Bronx, Council District no. 16.  This matter is subject to Council Review and action pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter and Article 16 of the General Municipal Law.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application no. 20065154 TCK, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Roll-N-Roaster Corp., to establish, maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 2901 Emmons Avenue, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 46.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application no. 20065398 HAK, an Urban Development Action Area Project located at 303 and 280-282 Grand Street, Council District no. 34, Borough of Brooklyn.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law, at the request of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development, and pursuant to Section 696 of the General Municipal Law for an exemption from real property taxes.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application no. 20065407 HAQ, an Urban Development Action Area Project, located at 188-09 Linden Boulevard, Council District no. 27, Borough of Queens. Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
